  • Method Details

    • getProduct

      @RequestMapping(value="/getProduct", method=POST, headers="Accept=application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getProduct(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> obj) throws Exception
      This method is used to retrieve list of active product based upon Approval Configuration for the specified site.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - [Map] map object with "userinfo" as key for which the list is to be fetched
      Returns:
      response object with list of active Product that are to be listed for the specified site
      Throws:
      Exception

    • createProduct

      @RequestMapping(value="/createProduct", method=POST, headers="Accept=application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createProduct(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> obj) throws Exception
      This method is used to insert the product based upon Approval Configuration for the specified site.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - [Map] map object with "product" object and userinfo as key for which the list is to be fetched
      Returns:
      response object with list of active Product that are to be listed for the specified site
      Throws:
      Exception

    • updateProduct

      @RequestMapping(value="/updateProduct", method=POST, headers="Accept=application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateProduct(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> obj) throws Exception
      This interface declaration is used to update entry in Product table through its DAO layer.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - [Map] object with keys of product [Product] and UserInfo object entity.
      Returns:
      response entity List of Product entity
      Throws:
      Exception - that are thrown in the DAO layer

      @PostMapping("/getActiveProductById") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getActiveProductById(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      This method is used to retrieve selected active product detail.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - [Map] map object with "nproductcode" and "userInfo" as keys for which the data is to be fetched
      Returns:

    • createProductFile

      @PostMapping("/createProductFile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createProductFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartHttpServletRequest request) throws Exception
      Uploads a new file associated with a product.
      Parameters:
      request - Multipart HTTP request containing file and "userinfo".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with upload status and file metadata.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file upload fails or parsing issues occur.

    • editProductFile

      @PostMapping("/editProductFile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> editProductFile(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      Edits metadata of an existing product file.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Map containing "productfile" and "userinfo".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with updated file metadata.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file metadata update fails.

    • updateProductFile

      @PostMapping("/updateProductFile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateProductFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartHttpServletRequest request) throws Exception
      Updates an existing product file. May include reupload of file.
      Parameters:
      request - Multipart HTTP request with updated file and "userinfo".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with updated file info or error message.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file update fails.

    • deleteProductFile

      @PostMapping("/deleteProductFile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteProductFile(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap) throws Exception
      Deletes a product file. Handles reassignment of default if necessary.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Map containing "productfile" and "userinfo".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with deletion status and updated file list.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file deletion fails or file not found.

    • viewAttachedProductFile

      @PostMapping("/viewAttachedProductFile") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> viewAttachedProductFile(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> inputMap, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws Exception
      Retrieves content or path of an attached product file.
      Parameters:
      inputMap - Map containing "productfile" and "userinfo".
      response - HTTP response object to stream file if needed.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with file content or metadata.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file retrieval fails.

    • getProductFile

      @RequestMapping(value="/getProductFile", method=POST, headers="Accept=application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getProductFile(@RequestBody Map<String,Object> obj) throws Exception
      Retrieves list of files associated with a product.
      Parameters:
      obj - Map containing "userinfo" and optional "nproductcode".
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with list of product files.
      Throws:
      Exception - If file list retrieval fails.
